name: Hello Charlotte: Delirium
description:
Synopsis:
Welcome back to the House, mr/mrs. Anonymous!

In this world, Puppeteers do not exist.
In a two-dimensional world without morals, what kind of girl would Charlotte be?

Have fun, and bon appetit!

Info:
HC: Delirium is a short spin-off puzzle adventure game set in an alternative universe somewhere between EP1 and EP2.
It's about half an hour long.

Now available in Spanish and Chinese!

Warnings:
The game has some graphic content and chase scenes.
It's best to play Delirium after you've finished EP2.
